title: Young Thug
summary: Jeffery Lamar Williams[6] (born August 16, 1991), known professionally as Young Thug,[1] is an American rapper. He is considered to be an influential figure of his generation, with his music impacting the modern sound of hip hop and trap music.[7] Known for his eccentric vocal style and fashion,[8] Thug initially released a series of independent mixtapes beginning in 2011 with I Came from Nothing. In early 2013, he signed with Gucci Mane's 1017 Records,[9] and later that year he released his label debut mixtape 1017 Thug to critical praise.[10]
